scope: GenoMAXÂ² Bloodwork Engine v1 - Reference Ranges

policy.if_missing_range: MISSING_RANGE (emit REQUIRE_REVIEW; do not infer numeric thresholds)

notes: Numeric reference ranges are intentionally omitted from v1.0 because verified lab-specific thresholds were not provided.
Populate ranges from authoritative sources (lab report reference ranges, official lab reference tables, or an approved clinical dataset).
Until then, the engine must treat all markers as MISSING_RANGE and emit REQUIRE_REVIEW.
